name: Maison Alfred condiment - 3

attributes.title: Shelf-life and Storage
attributes.details: Shelf-life: One year. Storage: Keep refrigerate once open

description:
The combination of red pepper, walnuts, and a hint of garlic, make this condiment a must try, for all hot dish lovers. Roundness and spiciness are at the rendezvous. Spread in a burger; as mustard, with meat, in scrambled eggs. You won’t stop loving it!

Spice up your dishes with this exquisite condiment made from fresh super healthy ingredients.

Made from fresh ingredients. Use it on any dish or plate! Cold: In salads, pasta, with seafood, on toast. Hot: In rice, chicken, potatoes, sauté dishes…As a marinade: for chicken, turkey, white fish, vegetables.
